overview: Peggy Lee was a performer without peer----a singer, songwriter, actress and artist who spanned genres and generations with music that remains vital and captivating.  Sultry and swinging, Peggy's biggest hits are featured here:  Fever; I'm A Woman; Alright, Okay You Win; Lover: Big Spender; It's A Good Day and the Grammy Award winning Is That All There Is.  This special collection of Peggy's television appearances also offers an enticing variety of more favorites:  I Can't Stop Loving You, Unforgettable, I Don't Know Enough About You, Somebody Lovers Me, Manana, Me & My Shadow, The Lonesome Road, He's Gone Away, So What's New, Louisville Lou and Things Are Swingin'  ---- Plus duets with Johnny Cash, Petula Clark, Stever Lwarence & Eydie Gorme, a Featurette with Michael Feinstein and a salute from Paul McCartney.
title: Peggy Lee: Things Are Swingin'
